abstract: After-party for the art, design and music festival Creators Project, held at Brooklyn's Powerhouse Arena venue, shares the same uninhibited spirit as the festival itself.
snippet: The after-party for the Creators Project, a festival of art, design and music, was as uninhibited as the festival itself.
lead_paragraph: The after-party for the Creators Project, a festival of art, design and music, was as uninhibited as the festival itself.

headline.main: In the Midnight Hour, a Second Wind
headline.print_headline: In the Midnight Hour, a Second Wind
headline.seo: In Brooklyn, Two Days of Peace and Music, Sort Of - Scene City
